Mapping Value: CASE   WHEN S5AM1C >= 0 THEN ABS(TO_NUMBER(((S5PF.S5AM4C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)) + ((S5PF.S5AM1C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)))) ELSE ABS(TO_NUMBER((S5PF.S5AM4C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED))) END
CASE WHEN S5AM1D <= 0 THEN ABS(TO_NUMBER(((S5AM4D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)) + ((S5PF.S5AM1D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)))) ELSE ABS(TO_NUMBER((S5AM4D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED))) END

INNER JOIN c8pf ON c8pf.c8ccy = scpf.scccy
